usefulItems: ovenproof non-stick frying pan (22 cm), oven
title: Dutch baby pancake with fruit and yoghurt

ingredients.content: fresh fruit of choice, to serve

preparations.content: Preheat oven to 220°C. Place an ovenproof non-stick frying pan or skillet (22 cm) into oven to heat for a minimum of 15 minutes. Meanwhile, proceed with recipe.
Place eggs, milk, flour, salt and vanilla paste into mixing bowl and mix <b>15 sec/speed 4<b> or until smooth.

Carefully remove frying pan from oven and add butter. Allow to melt, then swirl to coat the surface. Pour batter into pan and bake for 15 minutes (220°C), until puffed and golden brown. Remove pan from oven and dust with icing sugar and serve warm with fruit, yoghurt and a drizzle of pure maple syrup.
